item.title: [delta] Fix for bombs cheat client attacking NPCS [delta]
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Tutorial on: Fixing bombs cheat client attacking npcs.
Class changed: Npchandler.java
Difficulty: 2 of 10.

Open up npchandler.java and search for:

Scroll a little down and you see this:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3777 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3778 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3779 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3780) { ResetAttackPlayer(NPCID); return false;
Right above the bracket add this

[code]if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ****) {
return false;

	}[/code]

What it does is stops the npc from attacking, thus the code:

I only released this because I saw there was NO fix for this, idc if it’s a snippet nobody looks there anyway. If a mod requests sure I’ll add it.

Read full topic
